name: Dexly Finance
desc: Direct capital provider with ISO-first positioning. CEO Burkay Kaplan studied at Harvard Business School, Stanford GSB (Venture Capital), and Wharton. Angel investor with 70+ investments incl. Polygon, Chainlink, Dfinity. Small team -- CEO is likely sole decision-maker.

leaders.bg: William Paterson Univ (Finance + Sales). Harvard Business School, Stanford GSB, Wharton. 70+ angel investments. 32+ countries experience.

name: Aspire Funding Platform
desc: MCA funder already using API/OCR technology alongside veteran underwriters. Offers same-day and 24-hour funding with up to 17-point ISO commissions.

leaders.bg: CUNY Brooklyn College. MCA industry veteran. Previously associated with All-Star Capital. Built Aspire with API/OCR-forward approach.
Dual-role managing ops and marketing. Oversees day-to-day workflow and ISO partner attraction.
Leads underwriting team. Oversees deal evaluation and approval processes. Direct buyer for underwriting tools.
Hands-on underwriter handling deal evaluations. Can speak to daily pain points.

name: Simply Funding
desc: Direct MCA funder founded 2017 by Bernard Mittelman. 28 employees, relocated from Manhattan to Jersey City. Doubled funding volume consecutive years. ISO-only model (no inside sales). A/B paper shop, weekly payments. Partnered with ACHWorks and Onyx IQ.

leaders.bg: Founded Simply Funding in 2017. Now in operational role but maintains founder equity and influence.
Joined as partner 2021. Previously Head of Ops at Shield Funding, VP BD at Venture Credit Solutions.
Oversees financial strategy, portfolio management, and risk assessment.
Manages all ISO/broker relationships -- Simply's sole distribution channel.
Represented Simply at deBanked events. Also Founder/CEO of Radiance Funding.

name: MonetaFi
desc: Brand new MCA funder launched May 2025 by industry veterans. Same-day funding (apply before 2PM ET), approvals up to $750K. White-label platform for partners. Based in Miami, FL.

leaders.bg: Decades in MCA. Previously Dir of Partner Relations at FundKite for 8 years (2017-2025). Founded ClickPayRent/ClickPay Services. Based in Miami.

name: Gulf Coast Business Credit
desc: Division of Gulf Coast Bank & Trust (est. 2000). Covington, LA + offices in TX, GA, AR, AL, AZ. AR factoring and asset-based lending. $3B+ financed annually. 250-499 employees. Serves trucking, freight, staffing, oil & gas, manufacturing. Meg Roberson appointed to IFA Advisory Board.

leaders.bg: Co-founded GCBC in 2000. Ole Miss Banking & Finance. Progressed COO to CCO to CEO. 24 years building the company.
25+ years in sales, factoring, ABL. Texas A&M. IFA Advisory Board member. Manages national sales/underwriting team.
At GCBC since 2009. Based in Atlanta. Specializes in staffing and transportation factoring deals.
Based in San Antonio. Ex-VP at Bank of San Antonio. Expanding GCBC Texas footprint.
Leads credit analysis and underwriting team. THE direct buyer for underwriting automation tools.

name: Likety
desc: West Hollywood, CA fintech for small business funding, especially eCommerce (est. ~2020). Same-day approvals. Founded by eCommerce operator who lived the borrower pain. Smaller team (~10-25). Active in Rebuy eCommerce community. May be price-sensitive but nimble.

leaders.bg: Ex-eCommerce founder (wellness brand). Ex-Cashbloom CEO. Built Likety around speed. AMA with Rebuy community Dec 2024.
Founder of Hubwallet. CEO of The Merchant Solutions (payments). Deep merchant services and payment processing expertise.
Also associated with Peak Finance. Handles BD and operations.
3+ years American Merchant Services. Ex-Rair Capital. Manages broker/partner relationships.

name: United Capital Source
desc: One of the fastest-growing biz finance brokerages. $1.5B+ matched across 75+ lenders. Jared is co-chairman SBFA Broker Council, Forbes Finance Council member, frequent media voice (Forbes, LegalZoom). Inc. 5000 in 2015 and 2017. Lean team but massive deal flow.

leaders.bg: Co-chairman SBFA Broker Council. Forbes Finance Council member. 15+ years in business financing. Industry thought leader.
Runs day-to-day operations at UCS. Key operational decision-maker.
Leads marketing strategy and brand positioning for UCS.
Drives strategic initiatives and business development partnerships.

name: Big Think Capital
desc: Direct lender & marketplace. $1B+ funded to 25K+ businesses. Melville, NY + FL. 110 employees, $19.3M revenue. Syndication investment platform. Fortune Best Small Workplaces 2025 (#19). VP Tech Brian Weiss is ALREADY building AI/ML pipelines for underwriting. CMO Ami Dviri ex-NY Life/JPMorgan/Deutsc

leaders.bg: JD Brooklyn Law. Michigan economics (Magna Cum Laude). Previously led $3B US mortgage firm. Ex-SVP at Lendio.
Bryant University (D-1 lacrosse All-American). With Big Think since inception. Drives revenue + syndication platform.
Marquette University Finance. Evaluates technology investments and strategic partnerships. Key decision-maker for new tech.
InfoSec background. Already building AI/ML pipelines for underwriting. Leads Salesforce architecture. WARMEST technical lead.
20 years Fortune 100 marketing. Ex-NY Life VP, JPMorgan Chase, Deutsche Bank. Joined March 2024.

name: LoanGeek
desc: Tech-driven CRE finance platform (est. Apr 2023). LiveDeal portal connects real estate investors with 250+ private non-bank lenders. 2025 NPLA Broker of the Year. Red Bank, NJ. ~21 employees. Also NPLA Broker Certification instructor. Note: CRE focus, not MCA.

leaders.bg: 20 years in RE-secured lending. Hofstra Univ. Ex-Deutsche Bank. Ex-Head ISO Relations at World Business Lenders.
Also CEO at 1West.com. Univ of Arizona, Eller College. Ex-VP BD at Seek Business Capital.
MBA. Deep RE tech partnership experience. Ex-Privy, CoStar Group, 42Floors.

name: Fund My Biz
desc: MCA-focused funding company founded in 2022, based in NY. Same-day funding with rates starting at 2.5% APR. John is a veteran MCA serial founder â€” previously founded Direct Merchant Funding and First Premier Funding. Active in deBanked community.

leaders.bg: Serial MCA founder. Previously founded Direct Merchant Funding and First Premier Funding. Active LinkedIn content creator.

name: Bridgeport Capital Services
desc: Coral Springs, FL factoring company (est. 1999). AR factoring, PO financing, bookkeeping. Serves staffing, manufacturing, transportation. 5-person leadership team. Publishing thought leadership on AI-driven factoring solutions in 2025.

leaders.bg: Leads Bridgeport Capital. Oversees all operations and strategic direction.
Runs day-to-day operations. Helps refine underwriting for factoring clients.
Since Dec 2008. Ex-Capital Factors VP, ex-Westgate Financial. Highly connected in factoring/ABL industry.
Ex-Merchant Capital Services, Capital Business Credit, Bibby Financial Services. Cares about operational throughput.
Miami-Fort Lauderdale based. Active content creator on factoring topics. BD-focused.

name: Fratello Capital
desc: NYC direct MCA funder with heavy ISO broker channel. Dedicated underwriting portal (fratellocapitalportal.com). Founded by Russell Kimyagarov (Yeshiva Univ, ex-Meridian Capital).

leaders.bg: BA Psychology/Business from Yeshiva Univ. Ex-Deerwood Real Estate, Fairmont Capital, Meridian Capital. Also Managing Partner at Integra RE Capital.
Queens College. Runs operations. May have been elevated to CEO role. Key operations decision-maker.
Manages ISO partnerships and broker channel. Front-line contact for deal flow.

name: Spring Funding
desc: Direct MCA funder and ISO-focused platform showcasing applications across 75+ lenders. 1-hour approvals, funding $5K-$500K. Flexible remittance structures. Same-day commissions to ISO partners.

leaders.bg: Founded Spring Funding as direct MCA provider. Built ISO platform connecting with 75+ lenders. Emphasizes rapid approvals.

name: Biz2Credit
desc: Major fintech lender (est. 2007). $8B+ SMB financing. 500-800 employees. Operates Biz2X white-label SaaS lending platform with AI underwriting. $312M raised. Columbia University AI partnership (Sep 2025) targeting $750B unlocked financing. FTC $33M settlement (Mar 2024). APPROACH AS PEER/PARTNERSHIP

leaders.bg: Columbia Intl Business. Crain NY Entrepreneur of Year 2011. Quoted by NYT, Bloomberg, WSJ. Building Biz2X AI platform.
10+ yrs Citibank/Xerox in financial services and risk. Heads credit and sales ops. Meets with Fed and SBA regularly.
25+ yrs digital transformation, AI, Big Data. Ex-CTO Impetus Technologies. BITS Pilani. Heads India ops for Biz2X.
20+ yrs B2B SaaS/fintech. Columbia Business School (also lectures). Driving AI-powered fintech strategy.

name: Newity
desc: #1 SBA 7(a) facilitator in the US. 125K+ businesses, $11.8B+ capital deployed. Founded 2020 in Chicago. Inc. 5000 #596, Deloitte Fast 500. Partners with Northeast Bank. Already uses Biz2X. Co-CEOs named American Banker Top 25 Visionaries 2025. Navigating major SBA SOP rule changes (June 2025).

leaders.bg: 30+ yrs asset management. Ex-CEO MatlinPatterson. Early partner at Fortress (grew AUM to $40B+). Colby College. Wall Street veteran.
CPA. Big Four background (EY, PwC). Co-founded during COVID 2020. Compliance and accounting mindset.

name: Thoro Corp
desc: Hallandale Beach, FL direct MCA funder. B-C paper specialist (higher-risk profiles). Up to $5M, no industry restrictions. Terms up to 24 weeks. Backed by private investors. Ownership through Yamazu LLC. Currently hiring MCA underwriters.

leaders.bg: Accounting background. Career in international finance. Manages ISO partnerships. Featured in FunderIntel Q&A.

name: Rowan Advance
desc: NYC-area MCA funder. ~200 employees. $98M+ funded per quarter. Revenue-based financing $10K-$5M. Factor rates from 1.28. Same-day commissions. Specializes in 6-10 month deals in 2nd-4th positions. ISO broker focus.

leaders.bg: Ex-Partner at Capital Express. Yeshiva University. NYC metro. Built Rowan to 200 employees and $98M+/quarter.
Manages financial operations and reporting. Key operational decision-maker.

name: Bizfund
desc: Brooklyn, NY MCA funder (est. ~2014). Global offices. 21-50 employees, $10-25M revenue. 90%+ approval rate. 24-48 hour turnaround. Min 6 months in business, $10K monthly revenue. CEO Danny Koshanfar previously founded Pearl Capital (2009-2012).

leaders.bg: Previously President & Founder of Pearl Capital (2009-2012). Ex-New Era Lending. Based in Miami/Brooklyn. Deep MCA experience.
Based in Miami. Manages ISO partnerships and broker relationships.
Manages day-to-day ISO broker relationships and deal flow.

name: Fenix Capital Funding
desc: Brooklyn, NY direct MCA funder (est. 2021). ~9 employees. BBB A-rated. MCAs $7,500-$150,000 with 4-12 month terms. MCA consolidation program. Approves within 4 hours, funds same day. Managing Partner Sergey Sprikut has JPMorgan/CIBC background.

leaders.bg: NYU Polytechnic BS. Ex-JPMorgan Chase, CIBC World Markets, Premier Capital Funding. Institutional risk management background.
Brooklyn-based. Manages legal and compliance. AI creates better documentation trails for MCA contracts.

name: Fox Funding
desc: Hollywood, FL / NYC business MCA provider (est. 2012). ~35 employees. ACH advances and MCA in 1st and 2nd positions. Funding up to $1M with 24-48 hour disbursement. President Joseph Rapoport is a former underwriter.

leaders.bg: MS Accounting, Fairleigh Dickinson. Ex-underwriter at Funding For Merchants. Understands underwriting pain firsthand.
Based in Miami. Strategy and competitive positioning.

name: 800Funding
desc: Miami, FL MCA and business funding provider. Direct funder. Programs include invoice factoring, PO funding, AR lines of credit. Emphasizes adaptive modern technologies. Finance-educated CEO (Hofstra). Seasoned team with decades of corporate finance/tech experience.

leaders.bg: Hofstra University Finance degree. Leads overall strategy. Emphasizes technology-driven efficiency in small business funding.
